Class MapTypeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.typehandler.AbstractTypeHandler
      • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.json.typehandler.handler.MapTypeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.typehandler.ITypeHandler, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapTypeHandlerEmbedded, MapTypeHandlerReferenced

    public class MapTypeHandler
extends de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.typehandler.AbstractTypeHandler
    Deals all fields, which contain Map content, which are NOT annotated as Referenced or Embedded
